metadata.name: Github SSH Certificate Configuration Changed
metadata.comment: Detects when changes are made to the SSH certificate configuration of the organization.

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM vulnerability_finding WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('2') AND (lower(LOWER(action)) in ('ssh_certificate_authority\.create', 'ssh_certificate_requirement\.disable')))

output.summary: Detects when changes are made to the SSH certificate configuration of the organization.

metadata.objective: False positive: Allowed administrative activities. References: https://docs.github.com/en/enterprise-cloud@latest/organizations/managing-git-access-to-your-organizations-repositories/about-ssh-certificate-authorities, https://docs.github.com/en/enterprise-cloud@latest/admin/monitoring-activity-in-your-enterprise/reviewing-audit-logs-for-your-enterprise/audit-log-events-for-your-enterprise#ssh_certificate_authority
